name: Valley Girl
summary_text: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

name: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
summary_text: A couple's seemingly solid marriage begins to crumble when the wife discovers that her husband intends to divorce her.

name: Fun Size
summary_text: Wren's Halloween plans go awry when she's made to babysit her brother, who disappears into a sea of trick-or-treaters. With her best friend and two nerds at her side, she needs to find her brother before her mom finds out he's missing.

name: The Invisible Guardian
summary_text: A female inspector confronts a serial killer while dealing with the ghosts of her past.

name: Love and Other Disasters
summary_text: An American intern at U.K. Vogue helps her friends find love.

name: Berlin Calling
summary_text: A man tours clubs around the globe with his manager and girlfriend. On the eve of their largest album release he is admitted to a psychiatric clinic after overdosing at a gig.

name: The Apartment
summary_text: A recently engaged man sees a former lover and becomes obsessed with meeting her again.

name: I Am Not a Serial Killer
summary_text: In a small Midwestern town, a troubled teen with homicidal tendencies must hunt down and destroy a supernatural killer while keeping his own inner demons at bay.

name: Dickie Roberts: Former Child Star
summary_text: A thirty-something former child star hires a foster family to re-create the childhood he never had.

name: Eye for an Eye
summary_text: When the courts fail to keep behind bars the man who raped and murdered her daughter, a woman seeks her own form of justice.

name: Dark Crimes
summary_text: A murder investigation of a slain businessman turns to clues found in an author's book about an eerily similar crime. Based on the 2008 article "True Crimes - A Postmodern Murder Mystery" by David Grann.

name: BPM (Beats Per Minute)
summary_text: Members of the advocacy group ACT UP Paris demand action by the government and pharmaceutical companies to combat the AIDS epidemic in the early 1990s.

name: October
summary_text: A group of interns are going through the usual grind when suddenly an accident changes their lives. The protagonist can't get let go of it and becomes obsessed with it. What does it all lead to? Is it love or something else?

name: Phantom
summary_text: The haunted Captain of a Soviet submarine holds the fate of the world in his hands. Forced to leave his family behind, he is charged with leading a covert mission cloaked in mystery.

name: Ashes of Time
summary_text: A broken-hearted hit man moves to the desert where he finds skilled swordsmen to carry out his contract killings.

name: Post Grad
summary_text: Ryden Malby graduates from college and is forced to move back into her childhood home with her eccentric family, while she attempts to find a job, the right guy, and just a hint of where her life is headed.

name: Frequencies
summary_text: In an alternate reality, children learn how lucky they will be (their "frequency"), knowledge which shapes their destiny. The unluckiest boy must parse the mysteries of free will in order to pursue his forbidden love of the luckiest girl.

name: The Man Who Invented Christmas
summary_text: The journey that led to Charles Dickens' creation of "A Christmas Carol," a timeless tale that would redefine Christmas.

name: Becket
summary_text: King Henry II of England comes to terms with his affection for his close friend and confidant Thomas Becket, who finds his true honor by observing God's divine will rather than the King's.

name: Fallen
summary_text: A young girl finds herself in a reform school after therapy since she was blamed for the death of a young boy. At the school she finds herself drawn to a fellow student, unaware that he is an angel, and has loved her for thousands of years.

name: Alfie
summary_text: An unrepentant ladies' man gradually begins to understand the consequences of his lifestyle.

name: War Room
summary_text: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

name: Kaithi
summary_text: Dilli, an ex-convict, endeavours to meet his daughter for the first time after leaving prison. However, his attempts are interrupted due to a drug raid planned by Inspector Bejoy.

name: Gemide
summary_text: Sailors want to remain in their small world, warm and cozy and full of lies, but they kidnap a prostitute from some pimps.

name: Cat Ballou
summary_text: A young schoolteacher turns into an outlaw to avenge her murdered father.

name: The Seventh Sign
summary_text: Abby Quinn is eagerly awaiting childbirth but is haunted by dreams where she suffers a miscarriage. When she decides to rent a room to a mysterious stranger, she realizes a chain of events that will unleash the end of humanity.

name: Open Windows
summary_text: A jilted fan soon finds himself pulled into a deadly game of cat-and-mouse after he accepts the opportunity to spy on his favorite actress via his laptop.

name: Animal Crackers
summary_text: Mayhem and zaniness ensue when a valuable painting goes missing during a party in honor of famed African explorer Captain Spaulding.

name: Lymelife
summary_text: A family unit begins to bow under the pressure of a failing marriage.

name: Mary Shelley
summary_text: Life and facts of Mary Wollstonecraft Godwin, who at 16 met 21 year old poet Percy Shelley, resulting in the writing of Frankenstein.

name: Hasee Toh Phasee
summary_text: Nikhil is re-introduced to Meeta nearly ten years after their first meeting. Now, as Nikhil has one week to prove himself worth enough to marry Meeta's sister Karishma, the old acquaintances become quite close to each other.

name: Cecil B. Demented
summary_text: An insane independent film director and his renegade group of teenage filmmakers kidnap an A-list Hollywood actress and force her to star in their underground film.

name: The Life Before Her Eyes
summary_text: A woman's survivor's guilt from a Columbine-like event twenty years ago causes her present-day idyllic life to fall apart.

name: The Sand Pebbles
summary_text: In 1926, a U.S. Naval engineer gets assigned to a gunboat on a rescue mission in war-torn China.

name: Snow Falling on Cedars
summary_text: A Japanese-American fisherman is accused of killing his neighbor at sea. In the 1950s, race figures into the trial. So does reporter Ishmael.

name: Chinese Puzzle
summary_text: A 40-year-old father's life is complicated when the mother of his two children moves to New York. Since he can't bear them growing up far away from him, he decides to move there as well.

name: They Call Me Jeeg
summary_text: Enzo, a lonely and misanthropic small time crook, uses the superpowers gained after falling in the Tiber river to chase down a crazy gangster called "The gypsy".

name: Just Wright
summary_text: A physical therapist falls for the basketball player she is helping recover from a career-threatening injury.

name: The Business
summary_text: Frankie is sent from London to Spain to make a delivery to Charlie, who likes the kid and shows him the ropes including the use of guns and drugs. Frankie likes the sun, pools and the cute, bikini clad girls and stays in Spain.

name: The Sapphires
summary_text: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all-girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.

name: Kim Bok-nam salinsageonui jeonmal
summary_text: A woman subject to mental, physical and sexual abuse on a remote island seeks a way out.

name: Holiday Inn
summary_text: At an inn which is open only on holidays, a crooner and a hoofer vie for the affections of a beautiful up-and-coming performer.

name: Happy End
summary_text: A well-to-do French family deals with a series of setbacks and crises.

name: The Abominable Dr. Phibes
summary_text: A doctor, scientist, organist, and biblical scholar, Anton Phibes, seeks revenge on the nine doctors he considers responsible for his wife's death.

name: Satya
summary_text: An innocent man is embroiled in underworld after being falsely charged and sets out to punish the perpetrators who subjected his life to misery.

name: Witching and Bitching
summary_text: A gang of armed robbers finds a safe haven in a secluded village crammed with witches--only to encounter the bizarre, the unexpected, and the occult. Can they save themselves, and the rest of the world from the next witch apocalypse?

name: Gabriel
summary_text: Gabriel the archangel fights to bring light back to purgatory - a place where darkness rules - and save the souls of the city's inhabitants.

name: Welcome Home, Roscoe Jenkins
summary_text: Dr. RJ Stevens is a talk show host who visits his family in the deep south. While there he reunites with his brother Otis, his sister Betty, his cousin/rival Clyde and his childhood love interest Lucinda Allen.

name: Ready to Rumble
summary_text: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.

name: The Bad and the Beautiful
summary_text: An unscrupulous movie producer uses an actress, a director and a writer to achieve success.

name: The Great Buck Howard
summary_text: A young man, much to the chagrin of his father, becomes the new assistant to an illusionist in decline.

name: Tanu Weds Manu
summary_text: Manu comes to India to find a bride for himself and falls for Tanu at first sight but Tanu, a free spirited girl has no plans of marrying him.

name: StarStruck
summary_text: Jessica Olsen was expecting a normal trip to California with her family to visit her grandma. However, she agrees to join her older sister to find the famous pop star, Christopher Wilde.

name: All the King's Men
summary_text: The rise and fall of a corrupt politician, who makes his friends richer and retains power by dint of a populist appeal.

name: Safe
summary_text: An affluent and unexceptional homemaker in the suburbs develops multiple chemical sensitivity.

name: The Slammin' Salmon
summary_text: The owner of a Miami restaurant indebted to the mob institutes a contest to see what waiter can earn the most money in one night.

name: The Adventures of Ichabod and Mr. Toad
summary_text: An animated adaptation of "The Wind in the Willows" followed by an adaptation of "The Legend of Sleepy Hollow".

name: Up Close & Personal
summary_text: An ambitious young woman, determined to build a career in television journalism, gets good advice from her first boss, and they fall in love.

name: Iron Eagle
summary_text: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

name: The Town That Dreaded Sundown
summary_text: 65 years after a masked serial killer terrorized the small town of Texarkana, the so-called "moonlight murders" begin again. Is it a copycat or something even more sinister? A lonely high school girl may be the key to catching him.

name: I Love You to Death
summary_text: Joey Boca (Kevin Kline) owns a pizza parlor, and is married to Rosalie (Tracey Ullman). He's also a serial womanizer. Rosalie goes to extremes when she finds he has been cheating.

name: Blue Lagoon: The Awakening
summary_text: Two high school students become stranded on a tropical island and must rely on each other for survival. They learn more about themselves and each other while falling in love.

name: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
summary_text: A psychologist who begins working with a young boy who has suffered a near-fatal fall finds himself drawn into a mystery that tests the boundaries of fantasy and reality.

name: Sugar & Spice
summary_text: A popular high-school cheerleader becomes pregnant by the star quarterback and turns to crime to support her desired lifestyle.

name: Mrs. Brown
summary_text: When Queen Victoria's husband Prince Albert dies, she finds solace in her trusted servant, Mr. John Brown, but their relationship also brings scandal and turmoil.

name: Jabberwocky
summary_text: A young peasant, with no interest in adventure or fortune, is mistaken as the kingdom's only hope when a horrible monster threatens the countryside.

name: Karwaan
summary_text: Two friends and a chirpy teenager take a road trip from Bangalore to Kochi.

name: The Love Witch
summary_text: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.

name: The Heir Apparent: Largo Winch
summary_text: After a powerful billionaire is murdered, his secret adoptive son must race to prove his legitimacy, find his father's killers, and stop them from taking over his financial empire.

name: Asuran
summary_text: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

name: Amen.
summary_text: During WWII SS officer Kurt Gerstein tries to inform Pope Pius XII about Jews being sent to extermination camps. Young Jesuit priest Riccardo Fontana helps him in the difficult mission to inform the world.

name: Brilliantovaya ruka
summary_text: An ordinary Soviet citizen accidentally intervenes into a huge operation of international criminal group that trades illegally obtained jewelry.

name: The Seventh Continent
summary_text: A European family who plan on escaping to Australia, seem caught up in their daily routine, only troubled by minor incidents. However, behind their apparent calm and repetitive existence, they are actually planning something sinister.

name: The Stepfather
summary_text: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

name: Polisse
summary_text: A journalist covering police assigned to a juvenile division enters an affair with one of her subjects.

name: La tigre e la neve
summary_text: A love-struck Italian poet is stuck in Iraq at the onset of an American invasion.

name: Broken
summary_text: Three suburban English families' lives intertwine with tragic consequences.

name: Drowning Mona
summary_text: When a woman drives a car into the river to her death, everyone in town becomes a suspect.

name: Once Bitten
summary_text: A vampire Countess needs to drink the blood of a virgin in order to keep her eternal beauty. It seems that all is hopeless, until she bumps into Mark Kendall.

name: Dead Man on Campus
summary_text: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

name: Politiki kouzina
summary_text: "A Touch of Spice" is a story about a young Greek boy (Fanis) growing up in Istanbul, whose grandfather, a culinary philosopher and mentor,teaches him that both food and life require a ...                See full summary »

name: Phantasm II
summary_text: Mike, now released from a psychiatric hospital, meets with Reggie, and discover his dreams ( the events of the original film) are real, and they both journey to find and stop the evil Tall Man from his grim work.

name: Urban Cowboy
summary_text: Bud is a young man from the country who learns about life and love in a Houston bar.

name: Womb
summary_text: A woman's consuming love forces her to bear the clone of her dead beloved. From his infancy to manhood, she faces the unavoidable complexities of her controversial decision.

name: Emelie
summary_text: A couple's replacement babysitter turns out to be more than they bargained for when she subjects their kids to a series of twisted activities.

name: Moonlight Mile
summary_text: As he copes with the death of his fiancée, a young man befriends her parents and must figure out what he wants out of life.

name: Point Blank
summary_text: Samuel, a male nurse, saves the life of a thief whose henchmen take Samuel's wife hostage and force him to spring their boss.

name: Clockstoppers
summary_text: A teenager accidentally activates a machine that enables him to speed up his body so that other people seem to be standing still.

name: The Apostle
summary_text: After his happy life spins out of control, a preacher from Texas changes his name, goes to Louisiana and starts preaching on the radio.

name: Read My Lips
summary_text: She is almost deaf and he lip-reads. He is an ex-convict. She wants to help him. He thinks no one can help except himself.

name: Diabolique
summary_text: The wife and mistress of the sadistic dean of an exclusive prep school conspire to murder him.

name: Dhamaal
summary_text: Four lazy slacker conmen buddies who are jobless, homeless and broke learn about the secret of a hidden treasure from a dying thief and later embark on a race against time to find the mobster's buried treasure and claim it while being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hellbent to get the treasure all by himself.

name: The Librarian: Return to King Solomon's Mines
summary_text: Librarian-turned-adventurer Flynn Carsen endeavors to find King Solomon's mines.

name: Alice
summary_text: A spoiled Manhattan housewife re-evaluates her life after visiting a Chinatown healer.

name: The Lucky Ones
summary_text: Three different soldiers - a woman and two men - return from war and facing the peaceful life's problems of each other.

name: (T)Raumschiff Surprise - Periode 1
summary_text: Three hundred years in the future, Mars is colonized by humans and their leader Regulator Rogul plans to conquer Earth. Queen Königin Metapha is advised to send the gays Captain Kork, the ...                See full summary »

name: The Aura
summary_text: A deluded taxidermist plans the perfect crime.

name: All That Heaven Allows
summary_text: An upper-class widow falls in love with a much younger, down-to-earth nurseryman, much to the disapproval of her children and criticism of her country club peers.

name: The Second Mother
summary_text: When the estranged daughter of a hard-working live-in housekeeper suddenly appears, the unspoken class barriers that exist within the home are thrown into disarray.

name: Pieta
summary_text: A loan shark is forced to reconsider his violent lifestyle after the arrival of a mysterious woman claiming to be his long-lost mother.

name: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise
summary_text: The rising college nerds set out to a convention in Florida, but are not welcomed by the Alpha Beta representatives.

name: 5 Days of War
summary_text: A drama set centered around the war between Russia and Georgia, and focused on an American journalist, his cameraman, and a Georgian native who become caught in the crossfire.

name: Mona Lisa
summary_text: A man recently released from prison manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer.

name: Ghajini
summary_text: Sanjay Ramaswamy, who is suffering from short-term memory loss, sets out on a quest to find the people who were responsible for his ladylove Kalpana's murder.

name: Pootie Tang
summary_text: "The Man" is baffled by a chill hero's invincible weapon: gibberish.

name: XXY
summary_text: The story of an intersexual fifteen-year-old. She lives with her parents, who have to cope with the challenges of her medical condition.

name: The Little Girl Who Lives Down the Lane
summary_text: 13-year-old Rynn Jacobs lives alone in a high-class Quebec small town, but unknown to the neighbors, she is leading a secret and dangerous life.

name: Total Eclipse
summary_text: Young, wild poet Arthur Rimbaud and his mentor Paul Verlaine engage in a fierce, forbidden romance while feeling the effects of a hellish artistic lifestyle.

name: The Reluctant Fundamentalist
summary_text: A young Pakistani man is chasing corporate success on Wall Street. He finds himself embroiled in a conflict between his American Dream, a hostage crisis, and the enduring call of his family's homeland.

name: Rien à déclarer
summary_text: A Belge-Francophobe customs officer is forced to team up with a Frenchman during the elimination of the Franco-Belge borders in the 90s.

name: Heyy Babyy
summary_text: Three bachelors who are compulsive womanizers find their lives turned upside down when a baby is left at their doorstep. The trio suspect each other of being the father.

name: Steamboat Bill, Jr.
summary_text: The effete son of a cantankerous riverboat captain comes to join his father's crew.

name: The Layover
summary_text: Two friends on a road trip compete for the affections of a handsome man when their flight is redirected due to a hurricane.

name: The Canal
summary_text: A film archivist finds his sanity crumbling after he is given an old 16mm film reel with footage from a horrific murder that occurred in the early 1900's.

name: Love Is All You Need
summary_text: A hairdresser, who has lost her hair to cancer, finds out her husband is having an affair, travels to Italy for her daughter's wedding, and meets a widower who still blames the world for the loss of his wife.

name: Madaari
summary_text: When Nirmal loses his family in a disaster caused by government corruption, he embarks on a journey seeking accountability and revenge.

name: Cadillac Man
summary_text: Joey gets 2 days to sell 12 cars to keep his job and keep his girlfriends happy. It gets worse. He's juggling 3 buyers when a guy with a machine gun crashes into the car dealership and takes everybody hostage.

name: Bo bui gai wak
summary_text: Thongs and Octopus accept a job from their landlord: kidnap a baby. Soon, the baby awakens strong paternal feelings in the two crooks, leading to complications when it comes to handing him over to his possibly crazy gang boss grandfather.

name: Vampire Hunter D
summary_text: A young girl requests the help of a vampire hunter to kill the vampire who has bitten her, and thus prevent her from becoming a vampire herself.

name: Hungama
summary_text: The story of a bunch of misfits whose misconception about each others backgrounds end up in a series of chaotic, yet comic outcomes.

name: Pecker
summary_text: A talented young photographer, who enjoys snapping photos of his satirical, perverted Baltimore neighborhood and his wacky family, gets dragged into a world of pretentious artists from New York City and finds newfound fame.

name: Stranger by the Lake
summary_text: Summertime. A cruising spot for men, tucked away on the shores of a lake. Franck falls in love with Michel, an attractive, potent and lethally dangerous man. Franck knows this but wants to live out his passion anyway.

name: Jagged Edge
summary_text: A wealthy woman is murdered in her beach house. The husband is allegedly knocked out first. He inherits all. He has a female ex criminal prosecutor represent him in court.

name: Cold Skin
summary_text: A young man arrives at a remote island to take a post of weather observer only to find himself defending the watchtower from deadly creatures which live in the island shores.

name: The Bookshop
summary_text: England 1959. In a small East Anglian town, Florence Green decides, against polite but ruthless local opposition, to open a bookshop.

name: Summer Storm
summary_text: A close friendship between two crew teammates is tested when one slowly discovers he's gay and attracted to the other.

name: The Professional
summary_text: Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.

name: Far Cry
summary_text: An ex-special forces soldier turned boatman is hired by a journalist to investigate a top-secret military base on a nearby island.

name: Final Analysis
summary_text: A psychiatrist becomes romantically involved with the sister of one of his patients, but the influence of her controlling gangster husband threatens to destroy them both.

name: Heaven & Earth
summary_text: During the Viet Nam War, a Viet Namese woman struggles hustling on the streets, where she comes face to face with those involved in the conflict around her.

name: The Last Circus
summary_text: A young trapeze artist must decide between her lust for Sergio, the Happy Clown, or her affection for Javier, the Sad Clown, both of whom are deeply disturbed.

name: Alpha and Omega
summary_text: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their pack's social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.

name: Beyond the Black Rainbow
summary_text: Despite being under heavy sedation, a young woman tries to make her way out of the Arboria Institute, a secluded, quasifuturistic commune.

name: Bitch Slap
summary_text: Three bad girls travel to a remote desert hideaway to steal $200 million in diamonds from a ruthless underworld kingpin.

name: Bigil
summary_text: A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.

name: Ordinary Decent Criminal
summary_text: Brilliant, flamboyant master criminal Michael Lynch is more interested in his image and his posterity than the actual profit from his ill-gotten gains.

name: 12 Angry Men
summary_text: Twelve men must decide the fate of one when one juror objects to the jury's decision.

name: Elena
summary_text: When a sudden illness and an unexpected reunion threaten dutiful housewife Elena's potential inheritance, she must hatch a desperate plan ...

name: The Life and Death of Colonel Blimp
summary_text: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

name: Aqua Teen Hunger Force Colon Movie Film for Theaters
summary_text: An action epic that explores the origins of Master Shake, Frylock, and Meatwad, better known as the Aqua Teen Hunger Force, who somehow become pitted in a battle over an immortal piece of exercise equipment.

name: Los lunes al sol
summary_text: This is the story of those who live as if every day was a constant Sunday, those who spend their Mondays in the sun. The story of people who worked in a dockyard but are now unemployed.

name: Simply Irresistible
summary_text: A magical crab works wonders for a terrible chef's culinary skills, leading her towards the man of her dreams.

name: Insomnia
summary_text: In a Norwegian city with a 24-hour daylight cycle a Swedish murder investigator has been brought in on a special case. Sleep deprived, he makes a horrible mistake which is discovered by the killer he has been hunting.

name: The Love Punch
summary_text: A divorced couple scheme to recover the retirement money that was stolen from them.

name: Cadet Kelly
summary_text: A fashion-conscious youngster is horrified when she is forced to move to military school.

name: The Kindergarten Teacher
summary_text: A kindergarten teacher in New York becomes obsessed with one of her students whom she believes is a child prodigy.

name: Cocktail
summary_text: A love triangle between a guy and two girls, who are best friends but the complete opposite of one another.

name: With Honors
summary_text: Convinced his thesis will have him graduate with honors from Harvard University, a stuffy student finds himself at the mercy of a homeless man's demands when he holds the papers hostage.

name: Journal 64
summary_text: A series of mysterious disappearances in 2006 are eerily connected to the same institution.

name: Kill Command
summary_text: Set in a near future, technology-reliant society that pits man against killing machines.

name: Young Adam
summary_text: A young drifter working on a river barge disrupts his employers' lives while hiding the fact that he knows more about a dead woman found in the river than he admits.

name: Kodachrome
summary_text: Set during the final days of the admired photo development system known as Kodachrome, a father and son hit the road in order to reach the Kansas photo lab before it closes its doors for good.

name: Area 51
summary_text: Three young conspiracy theorists attempt to uncover the mysteries of Area 51, the government's secret location rumored to have hosted encounters with alien beings. What they find at this hidden facility exposes unimaginable secrets.

name: The Den
summary_text: While studying the habits of web cam chat users from the apparent safety of her own home, a young woman's life begins to spiral out of control after witnessing a grisly murder online.

name: Housefull 2
summary_text: A comedy of errors wherein four men help each other to fool their prospective father-in-laws creating a cascade of confusion and mayhem.

name: Hum Tum
summary_text: A novel look at the eternal battle of the sexes and the trials and tribulations of Karan and Rhea and their attempts to understand each other.

name: Shadow
summary_text: Life and intrigue in an ancient Chinese court.

name: Headshot
summary_text: Uwais plays a young man who washes ashore, an amnesiac with a serious head injury whose past comes back to haunt him shortly after being nursed back to health by a young doctor. Violence ensues. Sweet, sweet violence.

name: Half Light
summary_text: Rachel Carlson, a successful novelist moves to a small Scottish village to move on with her life after the death of her son. Strange things start to happen when she is haunted by ghosts and real life terror.

name: Ashoka the Great
summary_text: The epic tale of King Asoka's life is recounted.

name: House Party
summary_text: Kid decides to go to his friend Play's house party, but neither of them can predict what's in store for them on what could be the wildest night of their lives.

name: And Then There Were None
summary_text: Seven guests, a newly hired secretary and two staff are gathered at a manor house on an isolated island by an unknown absentee host and are killed off one-by-one. They work together to determine who the killer is before it's too late.

name: Omar
summary_text: A young Palestinian freedom fighter agrees to work as an informant after he's tricked into an admission of guilt by association in the wake of an Israeli soldier's killing.

name: McLintock!
summary_text: Wealthy rancher G.W. McLintock uses his power and influence in the territory to keep the peace between farmers, ranchers, land-grabbers, Indians and corrupt government officials.

name: I Am the Pretty Thing That Lives in the House
summary_text: A young nurse takes care of an elderly author who lives in a haunted house.

name: Psycho III
summary_text: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.

name: Johnny Dangerously
summary_text: Set in the 1930s, an honest, good-hearted man is forced to turn to a life of crime to finance his neurotic mother's sky-rocketing medical bills.

name: Moms' Night Out
summary_text: Hardworking mom Allyson has a crazy night out with her friends, while their husbands watch their children.

name: Siberia
summary_text: When an American diamond trader's Russian partner goes missing, he journeys to Siberia in search of him, but instead begins a love affair.

name: Weekend
summary_text: A surreal tale of a married couple going on a road trip to visit the wife's parents with the intention of killing them for the inheritance.

name: Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro
summary_text: Two friends, attempting to start-up their own photo studio, come across shady dealings, corruption and murder, and must fight to bring the guilty to light.

name: Trouble in Paradise
summary_text: A gentleman thief and a lady pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner. Romantic entanglements and jealousies confuse the scheme.

name: S. Darko
summary_text: Donnie Darko's little sister Samantha and her best friend Corey are on a cross-country road trip, but soon find themselves entangled in a dangerous glitch in the time-space continuum.

name: Interview
summary_text: After falling out with his editor, a fading political journalist is forced to interview America's most popular soap actress.

name: North
summary_text: Sick of the neglect he receives from his mom and dad, a young boy leaves home and travels the world in search of new parents.

name: Stroszek
summary_text: In Berlin, an alcoholic man, recently released from prison, joins his elderly friend and a prostitute in a determined dream to leave Germany and seek a better life in Wisconsin.

name: OSS 117: Lost in Rio
summary_text: Another mission of world-known French secret agent leads him to exotic Brazil.

name: Emperor
summary_text: As the Japanese surrender at the end of World War II, General Fellers is tasked with deciding if Emperor Hirohito will be hanged as a war criminal. Influencing his ruling is his quest to find Aya, an exchange student he met years earlier in the U.S.

name: RRRrrrr!!!
summary_text: A tribe of prehistoric people is puzzled - a murder has happened. The first ever one.

name: All the Way
summary_text: Lyndon B. Johnson becomes the President of the United States in the chaotic aftermath of John F. Kennedy's assassination and spends his first year in office fighting to pass the Civil Rights Act.

name: Love Potion No. 9
summary_text: Two scientists who are hopeless with the opposite sex experiment with a substance that makes them irresistible to anyone who hears them speak.

name: La fille sur le pont
summary_text: One night, a fading entertainer intervenes when a woman contemplates suicide, beginning a strange, unpredictable relationship.

name: The Clearing
summary_text: As an executive is held captive by a former employee, it's up to his wife to deliver the ransom.

name: The Shrine
summary_text: Two female journalists and a photographer travel to Europe to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances, only to find themselves embroiled in a struggle against a kind of evil they never expected.

name: Auto Focus
summary_text: The life of TV star Bob Crane and his strange friendship with electronics expert John Henry Carpenter.

name: Gangster No. 1
summary_text: Chronicles the rise and fall of a prominent, and particularly ruthless English gangster.

name: Sweet Sixteen
summary_text: Determined to have a normal family life once his mother gets out of prison, a Scottish teenager from a tough background sets out to raise the money for a home.

name: Hardware
summary_text: The head of a cyborg reactivates, rebuilds itself, and goes on a violent rampage in a space marine's girlfriend's apartment.

name: Overdrive
summary_text: Two car thief brothers, who journey to the south of France for new opportunities, wind up in the cross hairs of the local crime boss.

name: Elvis & Nixon
summary_text: The untold true story behind the meeting between Elvis Presley, the King of Rock 'n Roll, and President Richard Nixon, resulting in this revealing, yet humorous moment immortalized in the most requested photograph in the National Archives.

name: Baby Boy
summary_text: In South Central L.A., a misguided 20-year-old African-American man, a "baby boy", faces the commitments of real life.

name: The Cowboys
summary_text: Rancher Wil Andersen is forced to hire inexperienced boys as cowhands in order to get his herd to market on time but the rough drive is full of dangers and a gang of cattle rustlers is trailing them.

name: The Greatest Show on Earth
summary_text: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer are told against a background of circus spectacle.

name: The Dangerous Lives of Altar Boys
summary_text: A group of Catholic school friends, after being caught drawing an obscene comic book, plan a heist that will outdo their previous prank and make them local legends.

name: Another Stakeout
summary_text: Two immature detectives are joined by a pesky assistant district attorney in staking out a lakeside home where a Mafia trial witness is believed to be heading.

name: Peranbu
summary_text: A single father tries to raise his daughter, who has cerebral palsy, even as she is beginning to wake up to her sexuality.

name: Right at Your Door
summary_text: A dirty bomb goes off in Los Angeles, jamming freeways and spreading a toxic cloud.

name: Race
summary_text: Destiny makes two brothers- Ranvir and Rajiv - enemies of each other. Everything is fair in love and war.

name: Swamp Thing
summary_text: After a violent incident with a special chemical, a research scientist is turned into a swamp plant monster.

name: The Vikings
summary_text: A slave and a Viking prince fight for the love of a captive princess.

name: Romeo Is Bleeding
summary_text: A womanizing, crooked cop on the payroll of the mafia is confronted with the reality of his double life after he is asked to kill a beautiful and ruthless Russian gangster.

name: Captain Blood
summary_text: A young Irish doctor is exiled as a slave to Jamaica where he captures a Spanish galleon and becomes the most feared pirate of the Caribbean.

name: The Deep End of the Ocean
summary_text: The Deep End of The Ocean is a film about a family's reaction when Ben, the youngest son is kidnapped and then found nine years later, living in the same town, where his family had just moved.

name: Rams
summary_text: In a remote Icelandic farming valley, two brothers who haven't spoken in 40 years have to come together in order to save what's dearest to them - their sheep.

name: Irresistible
summary_text: A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town.

name: A Home at the End of the World
summary_text: A boy who has experienced many losses in his life grows to manhood and enters into a love triangle with a woman and his boyhood friend.

name: The Last Thing He Wanted
summary_text: A veteran D.C. journalist loses the thread of her own narrative when a guilt-propelled errand for her father thrusts her from byline to unwitting subject in the very story she's trying to break. Adapted from Joan Didion's namesake novel.

name: Raman Raghav 2.0
summary_text: Ramanna, a maniac murderer, finds a soulmate in Raghavan, a policeman, who inspects his murder cases. He tries to make Raghavan realize how they both are similar.

name: The Hungover Games
summary_text: A spoof on The Hangover (2009), The Hunger Games (2012) and other movies, TV series etc. 4 men, with hangovers after a bachelor party, find themselves in a future, dystopian, kill or be killed game.

name: Thunderbirds
summary_text: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

name: Atlas Shrugged: Part I
summary_text: Railroad executive Dagny Taggart and steel mogul Henry Rearden form an alliance to fight the increasingly authoritarian government of the United States.

name: The Out-of-Towners
summary_text: The remake of the 1970 Neil Simon comedy follows the adventures of married couple Henry and Nancy Clark as they are vexed by misfortune while in New York City for a job interview.

name: Mortal Kombat Legends: Scorpion's Revenge
summary_text: Hanzo Hasashi loses his clan, family, and his life during an attack by a rival ninja clan the Lin Kuei. He is given the chance by to compete in an inter-dimensional tournament to save his ...                See full summary »

name: Bob Roberts
summary_text: A conservative folk singer turns his hand to politics, running for the US Senate. He is not above dirty tricks and smear campaigns to gain an advantage over his opponent.

name: We Have a Pope
summary_text: A story centered on the relationship between the newly elected Pope and his therapist.

name: The Last Dragon
summary_text: In New York City, a young man searches for a Master to obtain the final level of martial arts mastery known as the Glow.

name: El crimen del Padre Amaro
summary_text: Politics and sexual passions threaten to corrupt a young, newly-ordained priest in a small Mexican town.

name: Pokémon 3 the Movie: Spell of the Unown
summary_text: In the town of Greenfield, a young, lonely girl's dreams and wishes are brought into reality by a collective of reality-warping Pokémon.

name: The Paper
summary_text: New York City tabloid editor Henry's faced with tough decisions while he faces several serious life challenges, and a tempting job offer.

name: Ong-bak 3
summary_text: Continuing from Ong Bak 2's 1440s, Prince Tien fails to revenge his parents' murder by the evil new ruler. The beaten Tien is rescued. Can he bring peace to the kingdom?

name: Taking Chance
summary_text: Based on real-life events, Lt. Col. Michael Strobl, a volunteer military escort officer, accompanies the body of 19-year-old Marine Chance Phelps back to his hometown of Dubois, Wyoming.

name: Pickup on South Street
summary_text: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

name: Samaritan Girl
summary_text: Jae-Young is an amateur prostitute who sleeps with men while her best friend Yeo-Jin "manages" her, fixing dates, taking care of the money and making sure the coast is clear. When Jae-Young...                See full summary »

name: Seven Days in May
summary_text: United States military leaders plot to overthrow the President because he supports a nuclear disarmament treaty and they fear a Soviet sneak attack.

name: The Lavender Hill Mob
summary_text: A meek bank clerk who oversees the shipment of bullion joins with an eccentric neighbor to steal gold bars and smuggle them out of the country as miniature Eiffel Towers.

name: Sunshine
summary_text: The fate of a Hungarian Jewish family throughout the 20th century.

name: Another Woman
summary_text: Facing a mid-life crisis, a woman rents an apartment next to a psychiatrist's office to write a new book, only to become drawn to the plight of a pregnant woman seeking that doctor's help.

name: Casshern
summary_text: Live-action sci-fi movie based on a 1973 Japanese animé of the same name (Shinzo Ningen Casshân). Theme song by Utada Hikaru.

name: The Bad Seed
summary_text: A housewife suspects that her seemingly perfect eight-year-old daughter is a heartless killer.

name: Poetic Justice
summary_text: In this movie, we see the world through the eyes of main character Justice (Janet Jackson), a young African-American poet. A mail carrier invites a few friends along for a long overnight delivery run.

name: El Cid
summary_text: The fabled Spanish hero Rodrigo Diaz de Vivar (a.k.a. El Cid) overcomes a family vendetta and court intrigue to defend Christian Spain against the Moors.

name: In the Company of Men
summary_text: Two business executives--one an avowed misogynist, the other recently emotionally wounded by his love interest--set out to exact revenge on the female gender by seeking out the most innocent, uncorrupted girl they can find and ruining her life.

name: Copying Beethoven
summary_text: A fictionalized account of the last year of Beethoven's life.

name: Amityville: The Awakening
summary_text: A desperate single mother moves with her three children into the notorious, supposedly haunted, real-life Amityville house to try and use its dark powers to cure her comatose son. Things go horribly wrong.

name: The Private Lives of Pippa Lee
summary_text: After her much older husband forces a move to a suburban retirement community, Pippa Lee engages in a period of reflection and finds herself heading toward a quiet nervous breakdown.

name: Lords of Chaos
summary_text: A teenager's quest to launch Norwegian Black Metal in Oslo in the early 1990s results in a very violent outcome.

name: Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte
summary_text: An aging, reclusive Southern belle plagued by a horrifying family secret descends into madness after the arrival of a lost relative.

name: Caramel
summary_text: A romantic comedy centered on the daily lives of five Lebanese women living in Beirut.

name: Primeval
summary_text: A news team is sent to Burundi to capture and bring home a legendary 25-foot crocodile. Their difficult task turns potentially deadly when a warlord targets them for death.

name: Operation Petticoat
summary_text: During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.

name: Summer with Monika
summary_text: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

name: Desi Boyz
summary_text: Two friends lose their jobs, then part bitterly after they get exposed as male strippers.

name: Greedy
summary_text: Rich, old uncle Joe is surrounded by relatives waiting/hoping for him to die while trying to look good and backstabbing the competition. What should he do?

name: Don't Hang Up
summary_text: An evening of drunken prank calls becomes a nightmare for two teenagers when a stranger turns their own game against them, with deadly consequences.

name: At First Sight
summary_text: A blind man has an operation to regain his sight at the urging of his girlfriend and must deal with the changes to his life.

name: Evening
summary_text: A drama exploring the romantic past and emotional present of Ann Lord (Vanessa Redgrave) and her daughters, Constance Haverford (Natasha Richardson) and Nina Mars (Toni Collette). As Ann lays dying, she remembers, and is moved to convey to her daughters, the defining moments in her life fifty years ago, when she was a young woman. Harris Arden (Patrick Wilson) is the man Ann loves in the 1950s ...                See full summary »

name: The Isle
summary_text: Working at a fishing resort in an idyllic location, but surrounded by various facets of human unpleasantness, a young mute woman falls in love with a man on the run from the law for committing murder.

name: A Day at the Races
summary_text: A veterinarian posing as a doctor and a race-horse owner and his friends struggle to help keep a sanitarium open with the help of a misfit race-horse.

name: The Snowman
summary_text: On Christmas Eve, a young boy builds a snowman that comes to life and takes him to the North Pole to meet Father Christmas.

name: Ride with the Devil
summary_text: During the American Civil War, two friends join the Bushwhackers, a militant group loyal to the Confederacy.
